scripts.deploy: forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/DeployL1.s.sol --rpc-url ${1:-localhost_l1} --broadcast --legacy --private-key 0xac0974bec39a17e36ba4a6b4d238ff944bacb478cbed5efcae784d7bf4f2ff80 && node script/generateTsAbis.js
scripts.deploy:verify: forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url ${1:-default_network} --broadcast --legacy --verify ; node script/generateTsAbis.js
scripts.verify: forge build --build-info --build-info-path out/build-info/ && forge script script/VerifyAll.s.sol --ffi --rpc-url ${1:-default_network}
